snippet.title: Megadimension Neptunia VIIR Iffy-cial Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
2d or 3d waifu? Why not both? Megadimension Neptunia™ VIIR (pronounced "V-two-R") is coming to PlayStation®4 and will be compatible with PlayStation®VR!

Visit the Iffy-cial website: http://ideafintl.com/nep-v2r/

This enhanced version of 2016’s JRPG Megadimension Neptunia™ VII features smoother graphics courtesy of a new engine, a revamped battle system, and a whole new VR experience. Now, their dimensions and yours are connected! Hang out one-on-one with each of the Gamindustri Goddesses, listen to their conversations, and watch as the Goddesses react to you!

KEY FEATURES
- Rendered in a new engine, you’ll experience a smoother, richer graphical experience!

- The Gamindustri Goddesses dimension-hop right into your PlayStation®VR headset! For the first time ever, you can interact with the Goddesses in VR one-on-one while they explore you, The Player’s, room.

- A renovated battle system allows you to set each attack combo mid-battle and introduces new elements of strategy and resource-management.

- Transform into even more powerful beings with their NEXT forms, and take control of a different set of characters who want to run Gamindustri!

- Customize your VR room’s furniture with Nep-worthy looks!
